Package ohos.bluetooth.ble

Class BlePeripheralManagerCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.ble.BlePeripheralManagerCallback

  • public abstract class BlePeripheralManagerCallback
extends Object
    An abstract class that defines the callback used to send notifications of operations on gatt server.
    Since:
    1

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlePeripheralManagerCallback

    • Method Detail

      • receiveCharacteristicReadEvent

        public void receiveCharacteristicReadEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                           int transId,
                                           int offset,
                                           GattCharacteristic characteristic)
        A callback that remote gatt client has requested to read a characteristic.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has requested the read operation.
        transId - Indicates the ID of the read.
        offset - Indicates the offset for a partial read.
        characteristic - Indicates the characteristic to be read.
        Since:
        4

      • receiveCharacteristicWriteEvent

        public void receiveCharacteristicWriteEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                            int transId,
                                            GattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                            boolean isPrep,
                                            boolean needRsp,
                                            int offset,
                                            byte[] value)
        A callback that remote gatt client has requested to write a characteristic.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has requested the write operation.
        transId - Indicates the ID of the write.
        characteristic - Indicates the characteristic to be write.
        isPrep - Indicates whether this write operation should be queued for later execution.
        needRsp - Indicates whether the remote device requires a response.
        offset - Indicates the offset for a partial write.
        value - Indicates the client writed the characteristic.
        Since:
        4

      • connectionStateChangeEvent

        public void connectionStateChangeEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                       int interval,
                                       int latency,
                                       int timeout,
                                       int status)
        A callback that the connection parameters were updated.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device.
        interval - Indicates the ID of the write.
        latency - Indicates the characteristic to be write.
        timeout - Indicates whether this write operation should be queued for later execution.
        status - Indicates whether the remote device requires a response.
        Since:
        4

      • receiveDescriptorReadEvent

        public void receiveDescriptorReadEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                       int transId,
                                       int offset,
                                       GattDescriptor descriptor)
        A callback that remote gatt client has requested to read a descriptor.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has requested the read operation.
        transId - Indicates the ID of the read.
        offset - Indicates the offset for a partial read.
        descriptor - Indicates the descriptor to be read.
        Since:
        4

      • receiveDescriptorWriteRequestEvent

        public void receiveDescriptorWriteRequestEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                               int transId,
                                               GattDescriptor descriptor,
                                               boolean isPrep,
                                               boolean needRsp,
                                               int offset,
                                               byte[] value)
        A callback that remote gatt client has requested to write a descriptor.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has requested the write operation.
        transId - Indicates the ID of the write.
        descriptor - Indicates the descriptor to be write.
        isPrep - Indicates whether this write operation should be queued for later execution.
        needRsp - Indicates whether the remote device requires a response.
        offset - Indicates the offset for a partial write.
        value - Indicates the client writed the descriptor.
        Since:
        4

      • executeWriteEvent

        public void executeWriteEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                              int transId,
                              boolean execute)
        A callback that execute all pending write operations for this device.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device will execute all pending write operations.
        transId - Indicates the ID of the request.
        execute - Indicates whether the pending writes should be executed (true) or cancelled (false).
        Since:
        4

      • mtuUpdateEvent

        public void mtuUpdateEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                           int mtu)
        A callback that remote gatt client has requested to change the mtu for a given connection.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has requested the mtu change.
        mtu - Indicates the new mtu size.
        Since:
        4

      • notificationSentEvent

        public void notificationSentEvent​(BlePeripheralDevice device,
                                  int status)
        A callback that when a notification has been sent to a remote device.
        Parameters:
        device - Indicates the BLE peripheral device has been sent notification.
        status - Indicates the new mtu size.
        Since:
        4

      • serviceAddedEvent

        public void serviceAddedEvent​(int status,
                              GattService service)
        A callback that whether a local service has been added successfully.
        Parameters:
        status - Indicates whether the service has been added.
        service - Indicates the service has been added.
        Since:
        4
